content: Straight from the fashion capital of Asia – Tokyo – come the butt revealing underwear. Suitable for both men and women, these black undies contain a bizarre yet hilarious butt graphic plastered over the back to make it appear as if your butt’s completely exposed.

No other garment in the entire galaxy is more suitable for your little Trekkie than the Star Trek onesie. Your bundle of joy will be ready for any mission or nap once they’re suited up in the ultra soft onesie made from organic cotton knit. It’s the ideal gift for any Trekkie parent.

The personal aircraft allows you to enjoy the freedom of going wherever you want without having to deal with traffic. The aircraft comfortably seats two with a travel distances of up to 344 miles away. It offers an unforgettable experience with an amazing view.

Create a whimsical environment in any room with the curvy dressers. These Seussian inspired dressers are a great way to accent a plain area of the home and are available in distinct shades and sizes to meet every family member’s needs.

You’ve chugged it, slurped it, sipped it, and now with the craft beer ice cream, you’ll be able to have it for dessert! Each savory pint is specially made with the freshest of ingredients to maximize the best attributes of each brew. It’s a true beer lovers delight.

When your plastic green infantry have lost their their vigor for battle, it’s time to call in the special forces – the metal army men. These white bronze cast army men come in all the classic combat positions and are ready for battle as soon as you unwrap them.

There’s no better protection for your wooden table than the shotgun shell coasters. The set of stone coasters feature a no slip grip on the bottom and are hand painted like the ends of 12 gauge shotgun shells. A fine addition to any gun enthusiast or hunter’s home.

With the Pinhead 3D stained glass there will be no need to solve the Lament Configuration in order to summon Pinhead. This hand crafted work of art displays the leader of the Cenobites, aka Pinhead against a stained glass backdrop – perfect for any horror movie buff.

Big boned, husky, burly, no matter how you describe yourself something we can all agree on is that toilet seats are uncomfortable for us – until now. The adjustable toilet is built with an expanding seat to better accommodate all body types.

Is there anything better than a nice juicy burger? Yes – cheeseburger cupcakes! With each bite you get a helping of lettuce, tomato, beef, and cheese all made from homemade frosting and sandwiched between a soft cupcake. It doesn’t get any sweeter than this.

Introducing the male equivalent of the push-up bra – the padded muscles shirt! This revolutionary t-shirt gives you the look of a defined muscular body without having to endure any difficult exercise, bodybuilding, or commitment to proper nutrition.

Minimize your risk of getting lost in the great outdoors by wearing the GPS navigator ski gloves on your next ski excursion. These high tech gloves display altitude, distanced traveled, and current location so you’re always aware of your surroundings and stay safe.

Avoid the hassles of traffic by commuting with the backpack scooter. With just a few simple maneuvers, your handy backpack transforms into an even handier scooter you can ride while all your belongings remain safely inside the bag – making it ideal for any college student.

If you wish to add a novel touch to your home, look no further than the custom 3D paper sculptures. The sculptures are lightweight, easy to move around and customized right down to the tiniest detail. It’s the ideal gift for bookworm and art lover.

If you’re a big fan of re-purposed obsolete technology, you’ll love the floppy disk drink coasters. These floppies are made of silicone and look exactly like the standard 3.5″ floppy disks of yesteryear. It’s a fun and geeky way to unsightly water rings on the furniture.

Whenever you find yourself floating aimlessly in the vast and dark corners of the interwebs, the USB astronaut light will help you find your way home. This handy light plugs directly into the USB port to provide extra visibility while working in dimly lit environments.

Share a lovely sushi meal with your favorite droid when you bring along the R2-D2 soy sauce dispenser. This incredibly detailed dispenser features a hollowed out inside and re-purposed holographic projector droid converted into a pouring spout.

The dynamic duo of Walt and Jesse are back and cuddly than ever. The Breaking Bad plush dolls reunite the legendary pair once more for a brand new set of adventures like hanging around the bed, watching TV and helping you with your chemistry homework.

Imagine never needing to replace your phone when new technology came out. The modular cell phone – a.k.a. phonebloks – is a concept that looks to revolutionize the way we think about smart phones, and is already being considered by manufacturers like Motorola.

Help avoid  party fouls at the next soiree you attend with the drinking glass ring. This glass ring is unlike any other piece of fine jewelry – it adorns your hand while offering an elegant receptacle for booze. No matter what beverage you favor, there’s a glass ring for you.

No bear, tiger, or lion skin will tie together a room quite like the monster skin rug. This handmade wool felt rug sprawls out over an area of 36″ x 51″ as it displays the slain monster and its fearsome teeth. It makes a fine addition to any hunting den or children’s room.

Organize your kid’s coloring station with help from the animal kingdom with the hedgehog pencil holder. This adorable wooden hedgehog provides a fun and creative way to stay neat and organized – by displaying each pencil as one of it’s brightly colored spines.

Get ready to wash yourself in under 12 parsecs with the Millennium Falcon soap boar. She may not look like much, but the tried and true Millennium Falcon soap bar has it where it counts – in 100% all natural vegan friendly cleaning power!

Dress like the most fashionable creature in the animal kingdom with the panda coat. This majestic coat sports the unmistakable two tone coat our furry friends are famous for. To complete the look, the coat features a soft panda head hood and fearsome claws.

Keep your beloved pet safe during night walks by fitting them with the illuminated pet collar. The collar is made using a patented illumination system that shines bright to make the collar visible from far distances. It’s also great for pets who liked to be walked without a leash.

Put a stop to the sinister Red Falcon organization once and for all with help from the Contra action figures. Both Bill “Mad Dog” Rizer and Lance “Scorpion” Bean are back from the eighties to pump their enemies full of lead and relive their ass kicking glory days.

Take a piece of your glorious childhood wherever you go with the Game Boy travel luggage. This travel bag is compact enough to comply with most airlines’s carry-on restrictions and features a unique design that is impossible to confuse with another bag.

Experience the thrill of surfing large waves even if the swell is flat with the electric jet propelled bodyboard. The bodyboard is easy to maneuver and propels through the water at lighting fast speeds, making it great for recreational use or rescue missions.

Send your palate on an exciting gastronomic journey with a batch of delectable gourmet canned bugs. These bite sized critters – a delicacy in certain parts of the world – offer a premiere way of entering the world of entomophagy from the comfort of home.

Even if you’re only traversing through suburbia, you put your backpack through the paces – wind, rain, snow, and other merciless forces of nature beat down on you. Thankfully with the weatherproof backpack you can keep your gear clean and dry.

Create the illusion a disgruntled D&D gamer has thrown their die directly at your window with the critical hit 3D window decal. This clever decal displays a red d20 dice and can easily be applied to any clean window surface, making it excellent for offices and game rooms.

Take your culinary skills to the next level with the pencil sharpener peeler. This specially designed peeler resembles a school pencil sharpener, and allows you to sculpt your veggies into aesthetically pleasing shavings that will complement any dish.

After a hard fought game of Tetris, get your revenge by squeezing the life out of these stress blocks. The blocks are colorful stress balls shaped like the famous little tetrinimos we all love to hate – especially the straight block who never shows up when you need him.

The yin yang bathtub is ideal for couples who want to spend quality time without encroaching on each other’s personal space. The unique yin yang design separates the tub in two equal halves – creating the ultimate in “his” and “hers” bathroom luxury.

Transport yourself back to your magnificent childhood with the Power Rangers long sleeve shirts. These mighty morphin’ shirts are designed like the classic suits of the original Rangers from the ’90s TV show and are available in all 5 colors. It’s dressin’ time!

Steal the spotlight in any room when you compliment your outfit with glitter tights. These fabulous tights come detailed with dozens of tiny glitter crystals to add just the right amount of flair to any outfit. They’ll easily become your favorite pair of tights.

Bring the Elder Scrolls into the real world with these incredibly detailed Skyrim weapons and armor. Whether you’re looking to defeat some giant crabs or simply complete your Dragonborn costume with realistic accessories, these handcrafted items are perfect for the job.

Defeat the Rebel scum in a penalty shoot out with the Death Star soccer ball. Thanks to the creative Death Star design on this geeky soccer ball, every time you the ball high up in the air it creates the illusion the menacing Death Star is barreling down straight onto your opponent.

Keep nasty insects and critters away from your tasty beverage with the soda can bug screen. The screen fits snugly over the opening of any soda or beer can and features small openings that allow you to sip while keeping any unwanted intruders from sneaking inside.

Place the finishing touch on your sci-fi inspired costume with Doctor Who themed doctor coat. Whether your aim is winning the costume contest, travelling through time, or fighting Daleks, this officially licensed replica of Doctor Who’s dapper coat is just what you need.

Be forever ready for battle by accenting your outfit with the ninja throwing stars necklace. This fashionably deadly necklace displays a sterling silver pendant, crafted into a unique interlinked Japanese throwing stars design. They’re great for unleashing the ninja within.

Dream about the glory days of gaming while sleeping on the giant N64 controller pillow. The ultra soft and fluffy pillow features the familiar layout of the N64 controller in addition to its unmistakable design – which works great for cradling the head and neck while you sleep.

Channel your inner superhero on the field with these Under Armour superhero inspired football gloves. Available in Batman, Spider-Man, Superman, and other iconic superheroes – these gloves will have you winning games and cleaning up the streets like a real superhero.

Tony Stark has been keeping J.A.R.V.I.S. hard at work knitting the Iron Man hoodie. The hoodie comes emblazoned with Iron Man’s signature armor and a special feature that allows you to zip up the hood all the way and become Iron Man – sort of.

Carry fun summertime memories wherever you go with the scented snow cone necklace. The tiny and vibrant rainbow cone provides the ideal way of expressing your colorful personality. It goes great with all outfits and features a fruity scent – like a real snow cone.

Stay warm and true to your ninja ways with the ninja style hoodie. This unique cotton sweater features a hood that closes 3/4 of the way up the face – just like a real ninja outfit. Now you’ll be able to sneak in and out of places virtually undetected during the winter months.

Unlock your phone’s true potential with the iPhone sticky notepad. This cleverly designed notepad adheres to the back of the phone and offers a great place for jotting down a quick note or reminder. It provides a firm writing surface and is always visible and at hand.

Whether you’re dealing with a horde of zombies or a cluster of cars during rush hour, the zombie apocalypse survival vehicle is what you want to be driving. This sensible SUV features mounted machine guns and reinforced windows to help you survive any situation.

Disturb your house guests with this bloody hand towel that features blood red hand prints. These bloody useful hand towels will turn an otherwise pedestrian bathroom into something out of a murder scene, and are excellent for Halloween decorating.

The bacon mobius strip is bacon lover’s dream come true – a strip of never-ending bacon. This twisted strip features superb detailing, including raised surfaces and full coloring to achieve the look and feel of real bacon. It looks so yummy it’ll be hard not to take a bite.

Provide your pups with an adequate resting spot while conserving your valuable square footage with the Murphy pet bed. This lovely wooden pet bed folds up like a real Murphy bed when not in use, so you can get the best of both worlds.

Learn the ways of the Force and become a Jedi fashionista with these Star Wars themed lightsaber earrings. Available in red, green, and blue blades, these officially licensed Lucasfilm earrings are excellent for adding a geeky touch to any outfit.

Give new meaning to “the walking dead” with these zombie flip flops. Perfect for the rotten and decaying beach-goer, these red and green gory zombie sandals come in a variety of sizes and thankfully do not smell like a decrepit corpse unless you have really smelly feet.

Ferocious winged bears with lasers shooting out of their frickin’ eyes! Absolutely nothing is more stylish, awesome, or as useful than the laser bears wallet. With room for all your cards and cash, it’s the only wallet a dignified person like you should ever carry.

The pin press shelf is a super-sized version of the nostalgic pin art toy we all had as children. The shelf is made up of movable wooden poles you can mold into whatever shape you press into it. It’s available in various vibrant colors and looks stylish in virtually any room.

Embark on the adventure of a lifetime by proposing to your loved one with the Adventure Time Jake ring. This golden ring comes with Jake’s portrait engraved into the surface and features two bright diamond puppy eyes. His magical abilities also make it so one size fits all.

<del>Scare the stupid neighborhood children</del> Entertain trick-or-treaters with the frightfully fun giant inflatable animated spider. This colossal arachnid looms over all and features a rotating head which allows the spider to look for its next unsuspecting victim.

Add a layer of protection to your home with a life size Stroomtrooper action figure. This colossal action figure stands at six feet tall and depicts the mighty Stormtrooper in stunning detail – including a scale replica blaster. It’s the collectible no Star Wars fan should be without.

Hang ten – fingers – when you bust insane tricks using the finger surf boards. These pint size wooden boards are designed to fit your hand perfectly so that you can wind surf while in the passenger seat on a moving car. They even include a custom leash for extreme tricks.

Satisfy your sweet tooth from the comfort of home with the homemade bubble gum kit. This fun kit teaches kids about the magical sugar world of candy making, and it provides a step by step tutorial for creating all natural bubble gum the whole family will love.

Keep all your favorite cartoon heroes close to you when you begin collecting the pop culture coins. These coins from all over the world have all been modified to look like heroes and cartoons from all across popular culture. A must have for any geek.

No other gizmo on the market makes cleaning the house fun quite like the remote control mop. It turns the monotonous task of cleaning the floors into a thrilling game no member of the household will be able to turn down. Chores just became fun.

Keep mischievous trick-or-treaters from egging your house by handing out delicious Halloween cookies. These delectable cookies are baked with the finest ingredients and come decorated like all the spooky monsters that love to come out on All Hallows Eve.

Let the young ones run wild while you keep track of their every movement with the kid’s GPS locator watch. Kids will love wearing these stylish and colorful watches while you enjoy the benefit of knowing their exact location without having to be on top of them.

Stop frequenting the black market – now you can order fresh top quality unicorn meat from the safety of your PC. Featuring the most potent body parts of the unicorn, this fourteen ounce can of unicorn meat is known to boost male virility and vitality.

Outfit your eyes with Sanrio’s favorite feline with the Hello Kitty contact lenses. With customized Hello Kitty graphics on the lens, these unique contacts will give your eyes a bright pink hue that will outshine any traditional blue or green eyes in the room.

Take the art of grossing out friends and family into the 21st century with the iPhone controlled insect. This high-tech bug resembles a giant cockroach – with creepy antennae – that you control directly from your iPhone. Ideal for following around friends or your mom.

Awe at the genius of evolution by looking at the Narwhal explained sculpture. Through the use of a transparent body, the sculpture reveals the secret to how the Narwhal came to have their magnificent multicolored horns – by merging with the fabled unicorn.

The Breaking Bad NES cartridge gives fans and gamers alike a chance to own the greatest game they’ll never get to play. This retro game titled “Bad Breaker” displays Walter White, a.k.a. Heisenberg sitting atop a meth throne in all his 8-bit glory.

Generate electricity with every step you take with these clever shoe insoles. With an included battery to store your built up power, the insole is perfect for keeping devices such as your smartphone charged all day long, though its applications are practically limitless.

Give your little princess the gift of a lifetime with the exquisite fairy tale coach bed. This amazing bed is crafted of cherry and oak, with each wheel and bit of the frame being cut and detailed by hand. This bed will have your little one dreaming of fairy tales all night.

Convince anyone you were in a horrible nuclear accident by showing up with the bloody eye beanie. Whether you’re looking to stay warm or seriously disturb everyone around you, this stylish beanie – and the bloodsoaked giant eye – is just what your wardrobe needs.

There’s no limit to the amount of treats you’ll be able to create with the Pac-Man ice cube tray. Whether it’s making ice, cookies or lively jello molds, the tray makes eight Pac-Men and four ghosts at a time so that every gamer in the house can partake in the ice chilling fun.

Bring a little urban decorum into your humble abode with the skateboard deck lamp. Featuring four light bulb wheels and a creatively decorated skate deck frame, the lamps look great in kids rooms and can be hung vertically or horizontal.

The color changing chameleon lamp is the one of a kind lamp/toy able to change its color to match the surroundings. Once placed on top of a any colorful item, this neat lamp utilizes special censors to match the color of whatever it’s on – just like a real chameleon.

Bring new life to a classic console with the TRON themed Nintendo 64. With a slick black coating accented by glow in the dark strips, this classic console looks like something Flynn pulled right out of the digital world. A must have for all TRON fans and gamers.

Enjoy a plump heart or sweet pancreas anytime the moods strikes with some delicious chocolate body parts. These morbid morsels come shaped like anatomically correct organs available in milk, white, or dark chocolate. Makes a great gift for doctors and surgeons.

Nothing will get the adrenaline pumping quite like soaring through the air with the squirrel wingsuit. This unique and specially designed suit allows you to glide at astounding speeds like a majestic eagle and experience a truly impressive view.

Give that wise guy a gift he won’t refuse with this dead horse head pillow. With its racing days behind him, this surprisingly comfortable decapitated horse head plush will send a strong message to your recipient that you mean business.

As the internet raised generation comes into power, our currencies will take new form. In the digital format, bitcoins will become the new standard – and hard currency will be replaced with the gold Me Gusta coin. The Me Gusta will represent a prosperous and bright new world.

Lavish your little princess with the finest garments in all the land with the knitted crown beanie. Upon her coronation with this opulent beanie, your little sweetheart will be warm and cozy as the knitted crown cradles her head with a level of softness and style fit for royalty.

Enjoy the riveting feel of an Italian sports car when you sit behind the Lamborghini Murcielago desk. Work will get done in record time as you cruise by the workday with a desk modeled like the sleek and sexy Lamborghini Murcielago.

Show off your painfully sad family – or lack thereof – with the Forever Alone family car sticker. This cringe worthy sticker is excellent for the perpetually single types, and goes great with car stickers of cats, a computer, or a gallon of ice cream.

Defend your home with aid from Imperial forces with this life size Star Wars AT-ST Walker. It stands sixteen feet tall, ready to strike down any Rebel scum who dare drive up to your <del>Imperial fortress</del> home, and makes an excellent collector’s item.

Beer lovers rejoice! Now you can guzzle down all the delicious beer your body can handle without worrying about battling a vicious hangover the next day with this revolutionary hangover free beer. It’s alcohol the way God intended.

Teleport yourself out of some sticky situations with this World of Warcraft themed soap bar. Designed after the hearthstone, this hand carved “soapstone” provides teleportation and cleansing capabilities to any <del>toon</del> person who wields it.

Disguise your iPad like your favorite classic book by slipping it in one of the out of print eBook covers. The covers come decorated like first edition copies of all the great literary classics, that way you can appear worldly and intellectual while playing Angry Birds in public.

One afternoon with the incredibly delicious Grumpy Cat cake pops would be enough to turn even the real Grumpy Cat’s frown upside down. These tasty treats are decorated with extreme attention to detail and capture his iconic expression perfectly.

You don’t have to hail from Bon Temps to look like one of their impossibly good looking immortals. The True Blood vampire fangs are the professional grade fangs ideal for adding a couple hundred years to your appearance and are the perfect touch to your vampire costume.

Satisfy your sweet tooth in the most devilish way possible with the edible gummy skull. This ghoulishly delicious 7,000 calorie skull provides you with all the essential sugars your body need to get through the day – assuming you can manage to get yourself up from the couch.

Create a drink fit for a Time Lord with the Doctor Who ice cube molds. The molds create a tiny ice shaped TARDIS and Daleks you can use to cool down drinks, or to make other Doctor Who themed treats. They make an excellent stocking stuff for Doctor Who fans.

Maximize the utility of your laptop while helping to save the planet with the white board laptop cover. This useful cover protects your laptop from minor scratches while providing an erasable surface ideal for writing down notes, allowing you to  cut back on paper usage.

Explore the captivating field of magnetism with the interactive ferrofluid sculpture. This sleek sculpture is the ultimate desktop accessory  – the clear borosilicate glass allows you to both play and admire as the ferrite reacts to the external magnet.

You don’t become the greatest student by getting the best grades, you do so with the Japanese schoolgirl exoskeleton. This high tech exoskeleton exponentially increases your speed, agility, and strength so you can leap to the front on the class in a single bound.

The LEGO brick slippers are two LEGO blocks you won’t mind stepping on with your bare feet. Unlike their smaller counterparts, these slippers are made entirely from polyester and contain a thick padding to make you feel like you’re walking on clouds.

Now you can dress up this Halloween as the most convincing zombie possible with this professional zombie makeup kit. It includes everything from special fx blood to exposed teeth prosthetics – you’ll look so real you might even consider eating some brains.

Treat the drivers behind you to a comical image every time it starts to rain with the moving cat tail wiper decal. Unlike most cats, this joyful pussy cat is always smiling and loves the water so much so that it begins to wag its tail every time your turn on the window wiper.

The ring clock is the ideal watch for those who’ve always wanted to have a little bit more time on their hands. This imaginative stainless steel time piece fits comfortably and displays the time by lighting up the hour and minute with vibrant and colorful LEDs.

Strike up a conversation with anyone you encounter thanks to the +10 speechcraft that the Skyrim iPhone case offers you. The case is made from durable plastic in order to stand up to minor falls and scratches and is a must have for any modern dragonborn.

Avoid a possible dangerous slip on the wet tile floor with the ingenious and useful bathroom mat slippers. These unique slippers are shaped like towels you can use to dry your feet while simultaneously helping you avoid a possible fall by drying the area under your feet.
